file_content.text: Finally. I was getting bored. And when I get bored, prisoners start losing limbs.
Do me a favor, Commander. Turn this psycho into bantha fodder!
Ungh!
Let me speak to Father.
He doesn't always come when I call.
He may not answer.
What did Father ever see in you? Did he really think you could steal my throne?
You are not worthy of the throne. You are not fit to rule the Eternal Empire.
I'm more deserving than your new puppet.
She can't even protect her own people.
You sick, twisted... Torian didn't deserve to die like that.
No! You're a monster!
Only the strong get what they deserve. Isn't that right, Father?
She won't stop until all your allies lie dead at her feet. You know what you must do.
Even Valkorion is too scared to face me now that my chains are broken.
We aren't afraid.
Enough blood has been spilled. This has to stop.
Stay down!
Do you have any last words before I end this pitiful family reunion?
I've given you every chance, Vaylin. But you've left me no choice. You can't be saved.
You are beyond redemption.
I never wanted to be.
It doesn't matter what happens to me, Commander. Just take her down!
Ungh!
Now I'm going to make you suffer before you die.
You'll pay for that.
You really think killing some helpless underling has any effect on me?
She meant nothing to me.
Funny--I was thinking the same thing. Must be Father's influence.
No, but killing you will have an effect on them.
There's only one way to stop Vaylin. You know what you must do.
But we're not.
Stay down!
Any last words before I end your miserable life?
I'm done talking!
[Attack Vaylin]
Your father has been manipulating both of us. Don't you wonder why he's doing it?
This is what Valkorion wants.
His motives don't matter to me. Not anymore. Now I just want to destroy him... and you!
Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul!
Let's test your new freedom.
Release Vette, and I'll see what I can do.
First let Vette go.
You actually care for the life of this crawling worm? Pathetic.
Release Torian and I'll see what I can do.
First let Torian go.
Pathetic. Those words no longer have any power over me.
You actually care for the life of this fragile flower? Pathetic.
Of course. You're just a tool at his disposal. Pathetic.
He can't even protect his own people.
You sick, twisted... Vette didn't deserve to die like that.
No! You're a monster!
You really think killing some helpless underling has any effect on me?
He meant nothing to me.
I was getting restless. I was about to amuse myself by snapping your little friend's spine.
